title: Payún Volcanic Field
description: This false-color image is a composite of observations acquired on February 7 and March 20, 2001.  It was made from a combination of visible and infrared light, where green indicates vegetation, black indicates lava flows, and orange is bare rock rich in iron oxides.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
